examples.example: 在过去的两千个日夜中，我一直为梦想努力奋斗着。

translate.english: In the past two thousand days and nights, I have been striving hard for the dream.

examples.example: 我要在这两千个小时里，努力提升自己，让自己变得更加优秀。

translate.english: I will strive to improve myself in these two thousand hours to make myself more excellent.

examples.example: 在未来的两千天里，我相信自己会创造更多的精彩。

translate.english: In the next two thousand days, I believe I will create more wonderful things.
